fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

smoke_ball.name: Smoke Ball
smoke_ball.description: Fun for any age as they release a color cloud into the air.

firecracker.name: Firecracker
firecracker.description: Small explosive device primarily designed to produce a large amount of noise, especially in the form of a loud bang.

roman_candle.name: Roman Candle
roman_candle.description: Traditional type of firework that ejects one or more stars or exploding shells.

multiple_rocket_launcher.name: Multiple Rocket Launcher
multiple_rocket_launcher.description: A box that launches many rockets in the air.

fountain.name: Fountain
fountain.description: Emits showers of red, green, yellow and blue star with silvery and golden chrysanthemum, crackles and silvery glitter

spider.name: Spider
spider.description: This appears in the sky as a series of radial lines much like the legs of a spider.

kamuro.name: Kamuro
kamuro.description: A dense burst of glittering silver or gold stars which leave a heavy glitter trail and are very shiny in the night's sky.

palmshell.name: Palmshell
palmshell.description: A shell containing a relatively few large comet stars arranged in such a way as to burst with large arms or tendrils, producing a palm tree-like effect.

lead_azide.name: Lead Azide
lead_azide.description: Lead azide is highly sensitive and usually handled and stored under water in insulated rubber containers. It will explode after a fall of around 150 mm (6 in) or in the presence of a static discharge of 7 millijoules

mercury_fulminate.name: Mercury Fulminate
mercury_fulminate.description: It is highly sensitive to friction and shock and is mainly used as a trigger for other explosives in percussion caps and blasting caps..

ddnp.name: DDNP
ddnp.description: Although Griess had mentioned in 1859 that diazodinitrophenol exploded upon heating,

black_powder.name: Black Powder
black_powder.description: Gunpowder is classified as a low explosive because of its relatively slow decomposition rate and consequently low brisance.

smokeless_powder.name: Smokeless Powder
smokeless_powder.description: The basis of the term smokeless is that the combustion products are mainly gaseous, compared to around 55% solid products (mostly potassium carbonate, potassium sulfate, and potassium sulfide) for black powder..

flash_powder.name: Flash Powder
flash_powder.description: Flash powder is a pyrotechnic composition, a mixture of oxidizer and metallic fuel, which burns quickly and if confined produces a loud report.

petn.name: PETN
petn.description: 1 kg of PETN has the energy of 1.24 kg TNT.

rdx.name: RDX
rdx.description: RDX, an initialism for Research Department explosive, is an explosive nitroamine widely used in military and industrial applications.

water_gel.name: Water Gel
water_gel.description: A water-gel explosive is a fuel sensitized explosive mixture consisting of an aqueous ammonium nitrate solution that acts as the oxidizer.
